item.title: Deploy AspNET web site on IIS from TFS Build
item.description: In the last article of the series, I dealt with Deploying on Azure Web Sites from on-premise TFS, but the very same technique can be used to automatically deploy from a standard TFS Build to a standard Web Site hosted in IIS and not in Azure. For this demo Iâ€™ve prepared a VM on azure, but the configuration is the very same if the VM is on-premise or if you use a physical machine to run IIS.
